idea:
WE ARE GOODS AND SERVICE PROVIDER.

Firm for doing technology projects in the space of electrical and security. delivering robust systems tailor-made according to the client’s requirements. We provide safety solutions across various sectors, including Malls, Banks, public spaces, offices, Industries Residential buildings, houses, etc. We have been pioneers in providing highly sophisticated electrical, safety and security systems for the last 3 years. We have now transformed ourselves as AKSH FIRE & ELECTRICAL SERVICE a leading System Integrator for customized safety solutions – leveraging our extensive experience and industry know-how.

Equipped with state-of-the-art infrastructure and exhaustive technical knowledge, our experts design highly customized and integrated solutions for your safety requirements. We keep ourselves abreast with the latest developments in products and technology, to bring to you world-class solutions at competitive prices.

At AKSH FIRE & ELECTRICAL SERVICE, Our highly-skilled professionals possess in-depth knowledge of systems and processes and are therefore capable of comprehending your requirements to the point, to design tailor-made solutions. Be it sophisticated gadgets for domestic purposes, or high-end systems for organizations, we construct cost effective solutions that cater to safety requirements across the board.
name: AKSH FIRE & ELECTRICAL SERVICE

idea:

idea:
ACRNS Analytical Technologies founded in 2018 is a rapidly emerging company that provides services in the following areas:

1. Analytical consultation, laboratory setup

2. Training of students & analysts in instrumentation and data interpretation to address the requirement of skills, expertise, troubleshooting, and development of workflows for regulatory submission.

3. ACRNS is the official distributor of Protein Metrics – Protein characterization software, Intek chromasol chromatography columns and Axcend Focus portable HPLC & Spectrus Labs in India & Biometrics technologies in the western zone of India.
name: ACRNS Analytical Technologies Pvt Ltd

idea: ECOSAC essentially is a Utility Bags brand, consisting of Shopping Bags, Home Utility Bag, Travel Utility Bags and Sports Utility Bags. These bags are sold in retail and are also customised for brands, corporates or retail outlets
